com.dua3.utility.text.TextAttributes

Map<String,Object>
public final class TextAttributes extends AbstractMap<String,@Nullable Object>
An immutable set of text attributes.

    • getFontDef

      public FontDef getFontDef()
      Retrieves the FontDef associated with this instance. If the font definition is not already present, it initializes it using an internal method and caches it for future use. The returned FontDef is a cloned instance to ensure immutability of the original.
      Returns:
      a clone of the current FontDef instance associated with this object
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the cloning process fails unexpectedly

    • getFontDef

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      FontDef instance
